text:
INDIANA UNIVERSITY
BLOOMINGTON, INDIANA
ON SERVICE
10 AND TELEVISION
RADIO
October 17, 1961
Mr. Harold E. Hill
Administrative Vice President, NAEB
13U6 Connecticut Avenue, N.W.
Washington 6, D.C.
Dear Harold:
1*11 say my letter was confusing. The correct price for
the slides, single copy, should be $10.60 per dozen or
$30 for fifty. If more than one copy were to be used for
these slides, let us say two different copies, the price
for twelve of each would be twice $10.60, etc. Hope this
makes everything clear.
Cordi
ElmervG. Sulzer, Director
Radio and Television Communications
EGS:vz
cc: Mrs. Betty McKenzie
OCT 18 1961
I
